ext_description.message: Automatically blocks all pages from any website that is not in your list of allowed websites.

msg_warning_desc.message: This page has been blocked. To be able to view pages from this website, please add it to your list of allowed websites.

msg_filter_enabled.message: Block pages from websites not in my list

msg_filter_new.message: Add this website to my list

msg_filter_invalid_error.message: This website does not appear to be valid
